summary: Wheel of Time is Werner Herzog's photographed look at the largest Buddhist ritual in Bodh Gaya, India.
cast: The Dalai Lama|Lama Lhundup Woeser|Takna Jigme Sangpo|Matthieu Ricard|Madhureeta Anand|Tenzin Dhargye|Ven. Geshe|Werner Herzog|Manfred Klell|Chungdak D. Koren|Thupten Tsering Mukhimsar
title: Wheel of Time
